Windlord:
 
"just nighlight... Elita is too young" replied Windlord

o: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...

1 13:52:04 -0400
Subject: Re: Maximals - Ark Medbay







Rattrap keeps hi=
s composure only due to the fact that Straight Shot was gearing up for a li=
ttle payback.  Yet she was going about it in a composed and cleaver way.  S=
he finds the floor rather slippery under her tiny paw like feet and uses th=
at to accidentally on purpose, slide back first, where her quills are the l=
ongest and sharpest, right into Wheelie from behind!


" Whoops!  So sorry!=
"


Rattrap grimaces as she skids into Wheelie.


" That had ta hurt. "


T=
ucson realizes what's going on yet says nothing to stop his sister .  He kn=
ew Wheelie was in for something like that and it was only a matter of time =
until he learned his lesson.


" What goes around, comes around.  Anyway, w=
e will not have to separate Elita from her mother, we will just ask them to=
 be part of the capture strategy. I've done decoy missions before, this sho=
uld work.  Of course I will be right behind them if something goes wrong."
=

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 21, 2011, at 12:44 A=
M, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:




  


Windlord:
 
=
"Do you think that we have to take Elita away of Nightlight? "said the male=

 



To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Sat, 20 =
Aug 2011 23:48:19 -0400
Subject: Re: Maximals - Ark Medbay




Tucson sits =
back with a sigh.


" He seems highly interested in Elita.  There is someth=
ing special about her that he appears to want rather badly. "

Perpetually =
on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 20, 2011, at 11:41 PM, Airshadow =
Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:




  


Windlord:
 
"Who do you t=
hink that would be... the one that he would pretend to capture? Nightlight =
or Elita? Both?" Said gloomy Windlord
 



To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From:=
 magicquartz@...
Date: Sat, 20 Aug 2011 23:36:30 -0400
Subject: Re: M=
aximals - Ark Medbay




Tucson turns to Windlord.


Something tells me Rod=
imus may try to come back shortly to attempt an abduction.  I would like yo=
u to do a little recon mission for me.  See if by chance if you pick up on =
his energy signatures around this general parameter.  Even if his signature=
 is quite distant, we will have a jump on his location and perhaps be able =
to beat him at his own game."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.=

> wrote:

Windlord nodded
 
 



To: nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Sat, 20 Aug 2011 22:31:54 -0400
Sub=
ject: Re: Maximals - Ark Medbay




Tucson looks to Perceptor and Windlord =
thoughtfully, while resting his hands on his knees.  To him dreams were vis=
ions of events about to unfold.  He sighs softly before speaking.


" A nig=
htmare as vivid as the one you had is probably only half of what's to follo=
w in the future.  Most of the time we tend to wake ourselves up due to the =
shock of the visions we experience, which to me is perfectly normal.  Somew=
here, you did have a vision of the future, as did I not long ago, Nightligh=
t.  Fate is leading you down a path but you will never have to walk that pa=
th alone.  I promise you that.   Now I'm feeling much more like myself now =
and it will not be long until I can rejoin the battle. I will not let you d=
o anything alone, especially luring Rodimus out of hiding. "

Perpetually o=
n the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 20, 2011, at 7:40 PM, Airshadow Ni=
ghtstar <airly2002@...> wrote:




  


Windlord:
 
"Perceptor sugg=
ested that nightlight could help us to atrack Rodimus"said the male"But she=
's in shock. " and looking at the bots there"what do you think about her ni=
ghtmare?"

From: magicquartz@...=

Date: Sat, 20 Aug 2011 19:20:25 -0400
Subject: Re: Maximals - Ark Medbay

=



OOC:  I meant to say Nighlight instead of Talon when he put a hand on he=
r shoulder in my last post.  My bad.


Bic:


Straight Shot glares at her b=
rother .


" Yeah, what he said, you're not going anywhere until you fully =
recharge!  And that's final!" 


Tucson grins sheepishly.


" since you put=
 it that way, I better listen to you."


He sits back down on his resting b=
ed.  Straight Shot puts a tiny paw on his right knee.


" Remember what Leo=
 Prime said, sometimes a great leader can't always be in multiple places at=
 one time."




Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 20, 2=
011, at 5:14 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:




  
=


Windlord:
 
"You should rest Tucson, Sir"said the male"And we have to sen=
d a rescue party for Talon and others"
 



To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From=
: magicquartz@...
Date: Sat, 20 Aug 2011 00:32:35 -0400
Subject: Re: =
Maximals - Ark Medbay




Tucson Looks to Windlord as he holds his Katana. =
 With an assuring glance, he places a hand gently on Talon's shoulder.


" =
Those are very good questions Windlord.  I would like to see Nightlight and=
 Elita safe here at the Ark.  Straight Shot will definitely take excellent =
care of them.  And she has permission to lodge as many quills into enemy me=
tal as she deems fit.  It will give them a painful reminder not to underest=
imate the power of our joined factions.  And Talon, well, Master Yokitron a=
lways said strength was always greatest when you are in the company of your=
 heart's affections.  So, I want her to be with me.  Her skills are excepti=
onal in their own right and she deserves the chance to implement her talent=
s."


Tucson stumbles a slight.  But quickly regains his footing.  


Meanw=
hile Rattrap spots Wheelie and grins.  


" Hey look who decided ta wander =
in.  He sure deserves some " SHARP" reminders about insulting fellow comrad=
es.  If ya know what I mean Straight Shot".


Straight Shot whispers.


" W=
ell, not unless he says something ta rub my quills the wrong way".

Perpetu=
ally on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 19, 2011, at 11:28 PM, Airsh=
adow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:




  


Windlord:
 
 
"Sir"s=
aid the male to Tucson" What are your orders regarding Nightlight and Elita=
? what will hapened with Talon?"
 



To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magi=
cquartz@...
Date: Fri, 19 Aug 2011 20:59:15 -0400
Subject: Re: Maxima=
ls - Ark Medbay




Tucson musters all his strength to hoist himself onto a=
ll fours and transforms from the silver dragon into the silver dragon warri=
or. He narrows his eyes as he takes a solid stance and wields an impressive=
 Ninjutsu katana with a silver dragon coiled around the hilt.


" I'm ready=
, it's time to find Rodimus and free him of whatever demon is still torment=
ing him.  Then we retrieve the Matrix and put it in maximum security for sa=
fe keeping.  After that, he must not get it back.   The Matrix must be give=
n to Leo Prime, where I feel it belongs."


Nightshift looks to Tucson.


"=
 I dunno Tucson, The Matrix gave ya two upgrades already, I think that says=
 a lot about ya."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. ightlight a=


On Aug 19, 2011, at 8:33 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wro=
te:




  
LEO stood up and crossed over to where WING SABER was looking at=
 the
cordinates. He stroked his chin thoughtfully. "That cordinate, how
clo=
se will it get us?"

WING SABER turned back to the console as he accessed t=
he library
computers. "Hmmm." He said after a few moments. "It seems to be
=
located somewhere inside of this."

A picture shows up on the screen. It is=
 an arial view of a very large
jungle. "This picture was taken some time ag=
o, but it is the
approximate location that we recieved." WING SABER said.

=
LEO turned back to the others. "Then you folks had better get your
rechargi=
ng done, it seems that we have some exploring to do." He
pointed back at th=
e picture, "And there is a lot of land to cover."

WING SABER looked over a=
t NIGHTLIGHT, "And what ever happens, we will
do what ever we have to do to=
 save Rodimus."

There was a nod and a look of grim determination on LEO's =
face. "he
will be given every opportunity to recovered. I promise you."

In=
 the background, oblivious to the others LEGACY, BUMP and SANTON
were worki=
ng on SILVERBOLT.

(TAG)

Preston

<DIV id=3Decxygrp-text>LEO stood up and c=
rossed over to where WING SABER was looking at the<BR>cordinates. He stroke=
d his chin thoughtfully. "That cordinate, how<BR>close will it get us?"<BR>=
<BR>WING SABER turned back to the console as he accessed the library<BR>com=
puters. "Hmmm." He said after a few moments. "It seems to be<BR>located som=
ewhere inside of this."<BR><BR>A picture shows up on the screen. It is an a=
rial view of a very large<BR>jungle. "This picture was taken some time ago,=
 but it is the<BR>approximate location that we recieved." WING SABER said.<=
BR><BR>LEO turned back to the others. "Then you folks had better get your<B=
R>recharging done, it seems that we have some exploring to do." He<BR>point=
ed back at the picture, "And there is a lot of land to cover."<BR><BR>WING =
SABER looked over at NIGHTLIGHT, "And what ever happens, we will<BR>do what=
 ever we have to do to save Rodimus."<BR><BR>There was a nod and a look of =
grim determination on LEO's face. "he<BR>will be given every opportunity to=
 recovered. I promise you."<BR><BR>In the background, oblivious to the othe=
rs LEGACY, BUMP and SANTON<BR>were working on SILVERBOLT.<BR><BR>(TAG)<BR><=
